p: The previous studies for prediction models for seasonal influenza have focused on social networking service data, search engine query data, and environmental factors [ 32â€“ 34]. These predictors are correlated with present influenza cases with a relatively short-term gap, of about one to four weeks. However, the influenza surveillance data in Australia had a time gap of 22 weeks from those in the U.S., which can help to establish a data-driven influenza vaccine strategy about six months ahead.
